1211.title: Boy Squasher

12111.content:
It was the the first day of the summer holidays, and many children would be looking forward to have some time off from school to settled themselves down for over a month, that includes this eight year old boy, named Lewis. He was in bedroom, sleeping on a bed, a king-sized bed if you will! For that reason you asked, Lewis wasn't an ordinary boy when you think of it, he was huge, and obese in heck, he weighs at a massive 700lbs in weight.

This is all happens when an accident occurred, during the end of term field trip, recently. His class went to the Lab to help conclude with their project at school. Lewis was standing there among others, when a demonstration had a loud bangs, and he jumped so much, that he knocked one of the chemical vials over, and spilled right on top of him entirely. Most of them, including himself were rightfully concerned as to what would happen to a poor eight year old? It didn't took long when he felt his body had started to swell and he had gotten fatter, instantly!

His belly was swelling so much, it had lapped over his thighs. His butt and thighs were so wide and huge, it was the biggest part of his body, with his arms and legs thickened. His face looked chunky and developed into some chins, but still had that cute look to his face, but his clothes had ripped apart, and only his underwear briefs was all he had in him. Despite being large at 700lbs which was an estimation, Lewis soon smiled and felt the joy as if this was the best day of his life.

That was about last week, and already, his parents had gave him a king-sized bed to sleep on, and that's when it happens now, when he started to woke himself up, since he needed a long lie. He got up with again, only his undies in him, and started to yawn as much as he had some good sleep in it. Soon, he heard a knocked and Lewis gave permission to be granted. Then, a door had opened and saw who by coming over to see him?
12111.title: Meet Big Lewis!

choices: ...come to the living room and watch the TV?”
121111.content:
The door had opened, and Lewis see’s it was his mother named Betty, coming over with loads of food for breakfast, even for a 700 pound eight year old of all sorts. The youngster smiled and stares at Betty before greeted her with a sweet charming voice of his.

“Morning Mom!” Lewis greeted.

“Morning son, I’ve got lots of food for a big boy like you.” Betty says with a smile and gives the food to Lewis by placing on top of him.

“Mmm... I love the smell of that food already. Thanks Mom!” Lewis made his response and wasted no time by start eating his breakfast to start the day.

Betty loves his boy so much, it feels like he was all grown up, but not what she had expected when her son got home, looking gigantically obese for the first time. She can only think of him as a normal healthy looking boy. She was worried when Lewis came home 700lbs of fat and thought she needed to go and solve the problem. But judging by Lewis’ face in all, it felt like he loved being huge, and even Betty can see he’s still a cute looking kid, and so she kept it and simply enjoying having her fat son forever it seems.

Lewis was already had the halfway mark, when he let it out a kind burp, before asking his mother for a favour.

“Mom, can you rub my big belly for me, while I’m finishing my food?” Lewis asked nicely.

“Sure thing, sweetie!” Betty replied with a huge smile, and does this by uncover the duvet and see’s the size of that belly, that overlapped the front and the sides.

She looked blushed as we as Lewis, and she’s able to use both hands and rubbed her son’s fattened belly, and it did make him giggle so much, whilst eating the rest of the food at the same time. Betty never thought she can feel how soft and jiggly Lewis’ body is, even if it’s much cosy than his slim body from the past. Whenever both were tired, she would basically slept on top of Lewis’ belly and makes it feel like a pillow, much comfortable to say the least.

The rubbing continued, and even more so when Lewis had finished his breakfast, letting yet another belch and he joined in by patting his own belly in satisfaction. Then a moment later, he would got up and out of his bed, which his mother see’s him in undies which he doesn’t seem to care anyway. He smiled though and asked in a curious though.

“So, what are we gonna do today, Mom?” Lewis asked.

“Hmm...” Betty had that thought for a bit, but eventually smiled and says, which do make her son rather surprised by her offering. “Well, why don’t you...
121111.title: Lewis’ Mother Comes In

choices: ...I could squash you for a while?"

121113.content:
Lewis gave permission for someone to come in into his bedroom. he was well covered by the quilt of the bed, and see's the door opened right in front of him. The person who came to see him, was his babysitter named, Jenny! She's a seventeen year old girl, had knew Lewis for some years, even when he was slim before becoming huge in weight. She loved him very much deary and even Lewis was much comfortable with her, since he can had some fun with her by any means.

Jenny already knew what happened to him, during the cause of his weight being increased, but she hadn't saw what he looked like at this point. When she see's him for the first time, she was very much surprised to realized how huge he is, and even that smile from an eight year old boy, was still in him too.

"Wow, hey Lewis! You're certainly a big boy now, don't you?" Jenny says with a surprised as she came over and sat by him on his new king-sized bed.

"Yeah, and I love it too!" Lewis nodded and giggled with a lot of smile, before he would uncover the quilt and unveil his 700 pound size to Jenny in person.

That amazed Jenny to think of this, and even for an eight year old to be that huge is impressive. She's never seen anything quite like it before and she even been told that he can still move freely in his own right too. she would placed her hand onto his belly and left it feel how soft and wobbly he is when rubbing it to make it jiggle.

"Wow, it's amazing you've still love this size, kiddo!" Jenny says, still astonished to believe in such a thing, but she brushed it off a bit and tries to let Lewis know what's going on. "Anyway, you've got me for a whole weekend. Your parents are away to some business, when they saw you sleeping like an angel."

That puts Lewis blushed with his red face being shown and also knowing that Jenny was gonna look after him for a whole weekend, He surely was delighted and sits up again to let his massive body wobble in movements.

"That would be fun, when I have the best babysitter in the world with me." Lewis couldn't help but felt he was gonna have some treat from Jenny and see what's in-store with things to come. Of Course he wanted to ask her something, which he'll think it would benefited his size in general.

"Umm... Jenny?" Lewis wondered before he continued on asking, "Is it okay if...
121113.title: His Babysitter Came To See Him

choices: Sit on her stomach facing the TV
Sit on her chest and face
1211131.content:
Jenny pauses before smiling and says "Sure!"

Lewis saw the pause but frankly he was curious as to how such a tiny body would feel beneath his immense weight. Reassuringly, Lewis said,
"If I'm too heavy just let me know."
"Ok, you can sit on me," Jenny said.
Lewis thought to himself,
"Psshhht, like I needed her blessing."
Lewis instructed Jenny to lay down flat on the bed which she immediately did and then offered the tiny girl a choice. "Would you prefer it if I tested how good of a chair you are by sitting on you or would you rather I lay on top of you?"

In what future generations may one day describe as a titanic lapse of judgment the petite Jenny invited Lewis to sit on top of her. Lewis instructed Jenny to lay down on her back in the middle of the bed. Jenny did as she was told.

“Ok, first I’m gonna get in a good position,” Lewis said. Lewis first straddled little Jenny with his bulk essentially resting on Jenny’s slender torso but truthfully covering her from her neck downward.

Jenny couldn’t quite describe it but somehow this felt safe. “You’re not that heavy, Lewis,” said Jenny.
“Oh…we’re just getting started,” Lewis replied with a wide grin. And with that ominous remark, Lewis immediately threw out his legs from underneath himeslf, letting his titanic ass squash tiny Jenny deep into the mattress. Lewis was now completely seated, all of his immense weight, squashing down in to the 17 year old girl who might have weighed 80 pounds if she were soaking wet.

Now needless to say, Jenny was nowhere to be found. An onlooker would have thought that Lewis was sitting directly on the bed as Jenny was sufficiently squashed into the mattress by Lewis’s immense girth. Apart from the squashed babysitter herself, only Lewis could tell of Jenny’s presence beneath him because of the enjoyable feeling of Jenny writhing about beneath him. Now we can certainly agree that this writhing should be considered a welcome development because its absence would mean something horrible had happened. Nevertheless, Lewis found himself deeply enjoying Jenny’s squirming and decided to reply with a little movement of his own. He wiggled his hips and slowly rolled from side to side in an almost synchronous manner with little Jenny’s movement. The gigantic Lewis would occasionally come to a complete stop just to savor the squashing sensation. He decided to check in with his squashed little babysitter, “You alright down there?”

“Mrhhpmmmpmmhhhhrmmph,” Jenny replied incoherently as her face was currently pressed up against Lewis's ass. Lewis initially thought to consider Jenny’s reply an affirmative answer that she was fine, but then decided to check in on her. He lifted his left ass cheek up while his right ass cheek still squashed tiny Jenny. Lewis could not believe his eyes, Jenny was smiling! At first Lewis thought that it might be relief but it couldn't be. Jenny was actually enjoying herself. “You’re a comfy, soft and big blanket, Lewis,” squashed little Jenny said.
“Why thank you! And you’re a very comfy and strong cushion.” the giant squasher replied. Lewis asked if Jenny would like to watch some TV, to which Jenny replied with a yes.
Lewis asked his squashed babysitter, “Do you want to watch from underneath me?”
Jenny replied, “Why wouldn’t I?”
Lewis thought aloud, “Hmmm, so how should we do this?”
1211131.title: ...I could squash you for a while?"

1211131223.content:
Lewis had a phone call, which he’s able to use a video chat to see who is on the line. That’s when he smiled and see’s it was his best friend that wants to have a chat with him. And so, he hangs up the phone chat, and placed it back down, before he would give another wiggle on Jenny’s little body again, before letting his left ass cheek up, with his right pressing down harder. He began to smile and see’s Jenny’s face, just to let her know what’s happening.

Jenny nodded with a smile, and so she began to sit up and taking deep breaths, before able to open the window to have some fresh air, as a result of being squished by Lewis’ gigantic girth. She would finally watch some TV for a bit, as Lewis meanwhile was making his way to the door and answer it to see it was indeed his best friend, Connor, who’s here to see him.

12112.content:
Dean may be a good look 11 year old, but not quite extraordinary as he looks when he’s considered the fattest kid in the world, and still mobile as things stands. The kid stands at 7 feet tall and weighs at a massive 1,000lbs, and has a pear-shaped body, which his butt and thighs are much bigger and thicker than the rest of his obese body with his belly also looking larger too.

The boy loved being so big and huge, he had started to gain considerable weight at the age of 3 and didn’t looked back ever since. Though he did admit he had no purpose gaining just because he loved eating loads of food his parents gave him. That was until he age of 7 when size always matters and his only desire is to eat and get himself big and obese, once he realised he had weighed at 300lbs at that age.

Now at 11, and he shoots up at half a ton, and Dean is clearly enjoying himself, despite he had to squeeze himself through the frame and other obstacles he had to face because of his ginormous body in general. He loved his parents so much that they gave him so many treats for being a good boy. However, one member of the family who couldn’t stand Dean a lot, is his 15 year old sister named Nicola.

Nicola is a very stubborn teenager, who always been moaning and whining by any means. She despises his younger a lot because of the way her parents treated him out of respect of her, and she thinks she should get treated faithfully, due to being older of the two siblings. Nicola just couldn’t control her behaviour and her parents wished she should’ve respect Dean more when she’s also fat shamed him for eating so much food.

In these normal instance, Dean being offended by his sister’s words, would take revenge be using his half a ton-sized body to squash her for his own amusement. His favourite part was his giant fat ass he likes to sit on, and had her body covered underneath his own weight. Even better despite it may not be a good idea, his parents wouldn’t give him into trouble and would constantly blaming Nicola for shaming him in the first place.

Still, Dean clearly enjoyed it so much, he couldn’t wait to see his naive sister and squash her once again. It was right now when he came back home from school, squeezing his widened hips through the door, knowing he’s back in his place again. Now he needed so much fun since he worked so hard in subjects, and he wasted no time but to head to _______, where he saw his mean sister was in there.
12112.title: Dean loves squashing his mean sister!

1212.title: Squashee! I want a fat girl's ass on my face!

12121.content:
Dave Evans is 12 years old. He had this strange ambition to which he loved the most. He weighs at 92lbs and is a FA, and you know why he's the admirer? Because his 42 year old mother named Cathy, is enormous, weighing at a massive 900lbs Not only that, but his 9 year old sister named Chloe, is the same as his mother, but weighs at 700lbs. Everyday, both his mother and sister set up some modeling shoot for the website, and even much of their delight, they attempt to squash him, every single day, and it was fun to say the least.

"Hi Mom!" He called, before his mother turned around and smiled in a cheerful way.

"Morning, son! Did you had a good sleep, last night?" Cathy asked, whilst she was almost done setting things up.

"I did, and it was awesome as usual." Dave replied, and when he said as usual, his mother would know what kind of dream it was, and something like they'll be doing today as much of it.

"That's so lovely, Dave!" Cathy says in response.

Soon, she would kiss his son by a check of his face, just to know he was his Mommy's boy to say the least. Of course it did made Dave in blushes too and would let himself sit on the couch to take it easy for a bit or two, before he would ask what's happening for the shoot.

"So, what are we gonna do, today, Mom?" He asked.

Cathy then says in reply, to which in time, Dave's gonna be in this shoot with who?
12121.title: A Model Family

Of course, that made Dave's eyes lit up,and knowing that he was certainly looking forward to be squished by his sister Chloe, no matter how big though, he just wanted to be squished by any larger of the two no doubt. 12122.content:
It was on a Saturday afternoon, where a 15 year old boy named Alan is working in the experiment he couldn’t wait to try it for quite a short time now. There was something strange about him recently, but he couldn’t figure it out why it was in his mind when the topic came up. What he had saw from a number of videos and pictures was so many girls looking absolute obese, even coming up to about 700lbs or more in fact.

When he saw this for the first time, Alan couldn’t help but blushed with admiration, seeing their fat bodies wobble, eating, and even seeing them squashing a person or crush anything from that matter. He would’ve love to have a obese girl coming over to give some treatment, but the only setback is that he was pretty nervous, and also he would struggle to find any girls that are nowhere near where he lives.

That’s when main reason why he wanted to make a ray device, so that whenever he finds somebody for that matter, he could hit any skinny girl, and get massively fatter instantly. He learned to make these by his father, so he would manage to do this on his own, which he’d just finished the device he was working on.

But there was one problem, and that’s he wasn’t sure which girl would be able to get fattened by a device, and would any girl be satisfied than just being skinny all the time? That may be another setback, and Alan had to come up with a solution to convince the girl otherwise. He had his thoughts coming through his head when he heard the door from the front, and realised who it was that came home.

That person is his 9 year old sister, named Claire! She’s pretty much thin, with blonde hair, blue eyes in all, and she has the cute looks to her face. At first thought, Alan wouldn’t like to make that happen. But at the same time though, he thinks Claire is the only hope he can test it out, despite her younger age to say the least.

He couldn’t help but imagine of his sister getting so much fat, and able to move, which is like the same dream he had with other girls he can picture with it. Alas, he would shrug and give this a shot. So he would take the device and headed to Claire’s bedroom to see her, wearing a white shirt and pink skirt, along with her socks and sneakers. He let’s out with a smile and greeted her coming back home.

“Hey sis! How’s your day out today?” Alan greeted with a cheerful tone.

“Hey big brother! We had a great time!” Claire replied with a smile, when she was beginning to look curious by looking at the device Alan was holding. “Say, what’s that in your hand?”

That’s when Alan had to come up in response. But the question is, should he explain what it is, or just shoot at the 9 year old girl, and get fatter immediately by surprise?
12122.title: Alan’s Fattening Device

1221.content:
Your name is Gloria Cushman. At 7'6" and 930 pounds, you are a true giantess of an SSBBW. At 32, with perfectly tanned skin, shoulder-length blonde hair, brilliant green eyes, G-cup breasts, a bulging double-belly, and a 72-inch ass, you are a bombshell of a woman just entering her sexual prime. As the proud owner of a state-wide chain of furniture stores, you are a self-made millionaire with all the money and resources you need to indulge your deepest desire: squashing other people.

You first discovered your love of squashing other human beings when you were 16, and you rolled over onto your 19-year-old boyfriend one night and stayed there until morning. He writhed underneath you as you crushed him, and you had sexy dreams he struggles slowly made their way to your brain. He left you shortly after that--turns out he didn't like being crushed, the loser--but you successfully repeated the process on a series of men ... and later women, after you came out as bisexual. You have no real preference for any one group of people to squash, but women and girls tend to be smaller (and scream louder!), so you find yourself preying on women more than men for that reason alone. Your wealth affords you the ability to keep the local police in your pocket (as it were), so you've never faced any trouble for bringing a skinny young gal (or the occasional guy) home to squash over a long weekend--not even the one time you kidnapped two 16-year-old twin girls and kept them in your house for a whole month as your personal cushions, chairs, toilets, mattress.

You still have wet dreams about those two. Last you heard, they were paying their way through college by performing in lesbian facesitting movies. Good for them.

As your story begins, you are cruising through town, looking for someone to kidnap and squash for the weekend. Who catches your eye?
1221.title: Gloria Cushman, Squasher
